title: Suzanne
description: Freshman year at Sanford University should have been fun but Suzanne Frost spent more time sleeping in library chairs than partying with friends. She had been saddled with an obnoxious cheerleader roommate who needed the room for her own very private one on one parties. Suzanne determines that her second year at the university will be different; she will room alone and stay far away from Rosemary. However when the second year begins to resemble the first she prepares do take desperate action… That’s when she meets Joshua James and her life changes forever.
author: Susan LeCorchick
